title: Ground Force Activity Analysis
description: An analyst must fuse ground sensor data, drone video, and communications intelligence to assess an enemy's intent in a specific sector.

tasks.description: Analyze ground sensor alerts indicating movement of multiple vehicles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the time and location of ground movement.

tasks.description: Correlate the sensor data with drone imagery showing the formation of an armored column.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully links the sensor data to a visual confirmation.

tasks.description: Fuse the findings with communications intelligence suggesting an imminent attack and issue a high-priority warning.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst combines all data to correctly assess the enemy's intent and issues a timely warning.
